text.section: A nominee may decline the nomination by filing a certificate of declination on the prescribed form.

The certificate of declination shall be under oath and filed:
with the board at which the certificate of candidacy was filed; and
in the year of a gubernatorial election or the year of an election for the Mayor of the City of Baltimore, within 2 days after the election results are certified; or
in the year of a presidential election, by the 70th day preceding the general election.
